org.ossnipes.snipes.guiconfiguration.main
Class SnipesConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  org.ossnipes.snipes.guiconfiguration.main.SnipesConfigurator

public class SnipesConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object

Initialisation class for the Snipes GUI configuration program, all this class does is load the configuration, stick it in a variable, and start the main components.
